00035 #include "RadialSloughingCellKiller.hpp"
00036 #include "AbstractCentreBasedCellPopulation.hpp"
00037 
00038 RadialSloughingCellKiller::RadialSloughingCellKiller(AbstractCellPopulation<2>* pCellPopulation, c_vector<double,2> centre, double radius)
00039     : AbstractCellKiller<2>(pCellPopulation),
00040       mCentre(centre),
00041       mRadius(radius)
00042 {
00043 }
00044 
00045 c_vector<double,2> RadialSloughingCellKiller::GetCentre() const
00046 {
00047     return mCentre;
00048 }
00049 
00050 double RadialSloughingCellKiller::GetRadius() const
00051 {
00052     return mRadius;
00053 }
00054 
00055 void RadialSloughingCellKiller::CheckAndLabelCellsForApoptosisOrDeath()
00056 {
00057     for (AbstractCellPopulation<2>::Iterator cell_iter = this->mpCellPopulation->Begin();
00058          cell_iter != this->mpCellPopulation->End();
00059          ++cell_iter)
00060     {
00061         // Get distance from centre of cell population
00062         double r = norm_2(this->mpCellPopulation->GetLocationOfCellCentre(*cell_iter) - mCentre);
00063 
00064         if (r > mRadius)
00065         {
00066             cell_iter->Kill();
00067         }
00068     }
00069 }
00070 
00071 void RadialSloughingCellKiller::OutputCellKillerParameters(out_stream& rParamsFile)
00072 {
00073     *rParamsFile << "\t\t\t<xCentre>" << mCentre[0] << "</xCentre>\n";
00074     *rParamsFile << "\t\t\t<yCentre>" << mCentre[1] << "</yCentre>\n";
00075     *rParamsFile << "\t\t\t<mRadius>" << mRadius << "</mRadius>\n";
00076 
00077     // Call method on direct parent class
00078     AbstractCellKiller<2>::OutputCellKillerParameters(rParamsFile);
00079 }
00080

00083 CHASTE_CLASS_EXPORT(RadialSloughingCellKiller)
